title: Global mobile video traffic 2017 to 2022
summary: This statistic shows a forecast of global telecom services spending from 2017 to 2022 . About 1625 billion u.s. dollars is forecast to be spent globally in telecom services in 2019 . telecom services spending – additional information The telecommunication services industry , which includes fixed-network services and mobile and wireless services , is a trillion-dollar market projected to grow in the next few years .
